def.name: Client's age is less than 9 months

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 9 months

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" < 9 months

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: Client's age is less than 9 months-41

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.MenA conjugate vaccine 1 dose: MenA conjugate vaccine, 1-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines 2 doses: Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines (A,C,W135,Y-D), 2-dose schedule

operand.name: Current Patient Age In Months

def.name: No meningococcal primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No meningococcal primary series dose was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Meningococcal vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Primary series") = 0

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: No meningococcal primary series dose was administered-122

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.MenA conjugate vaccine 1 dose: MenA conjugate vaccine, 1-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.MenA conjugate vaccine 2 doses: MenA conjugate vaccine, 2-dose schedule (specific context where there is a compelling reason to vaccinate infants aged under 9 months)

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine: Monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines 1 dose: Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines (A,C,W135,Y-CRM), 1-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines 2 doses: Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines (A,C,W135,Y-D), 2-dose schedule

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Polysaccharide vaccines: Polysaccharide vaccines schedule (Polysaccharide vaccines can be used to control outbreaks in countries where limited economic resources or insufficient supply restrict the use of meningococcal conjugate vaccines)

a:s.a:s: "Number of Meningococcal Primary Series Doses Administered"

def.name: No meningococcal booster dose was administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: No meningococcal booster dose was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Meningococcal vaccines" and "Type of dose" = "Booster dose") = 0

a:t.name: code
a:t.value: No meningococcal booster dose was administered-120

a:t.name: decision
a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine: Monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine schedule

a:t.value: IMMZ.D2.DT.Meningococcal.Polysaccharide vaccines: Polysaccharide vaccines schedule (Polysaccharide vaccines can be used to control outbreaks in countries where limited economic resources or insufficient supply restrict the use of meningococcal conjugate vaccines)
